literals.value: Hashhan is a cunning queen, and mother of a cunning brood, Hashhan leads them in a primarily peaceful research cooperative. Hashhan and her brood use precision and technology to augment their more theoretical experience. Hashhan can discharge her breath in a near lightspeed beam of accelerated plasma, capable of cutting through armour with ease, using spatial distortions to cloak herself, using proximity annihilation mines, and an augmented laser array.
